root: ^Hi, I got the white flowers you needed.
^That's good kid. I'll handle them from here.
^These flowers are for my wife and daughter...
^That's so sweet, I knew you had a good reason for these flowers. I can't wait to meet them.
^I don't think I can let you see them just yet.
^Oh? Why is that? I am sure they are wonderful people.
^But it's not the time to be worrying about that, I still need you to gather some flowers for me.
^Come meet by the lake, south of the village.
^(I knew Mr. John was a good person at heart)
